title: Fps problems after first few minutes of the game
body: So for about a good month or so Ive been getting alot of fps drops. When i get into the game i get around 50s and 40s even like 80 but after a few minutes of the game my fps just drops to 20s and like 10s. When i alt tab out and alt tab back in my fps comes back but eventually after a few mins to seconds it goes back down to 20s or so. I only have this problem on summoners rift. It doesnt happen when i play customs but when i play normals/ranked summmoners rift i get these drops. Its been so bad that im thinking about quitting the game :((( please someone help. Ive tried every fps booster thing and fps helper on the league page for fps help. I really need help. Thanks

replies.body:
It seems like as the game goes on, the more assets are being used which is beginning to slow down your frames. Summoner's Rift also has a lot more files that need to be used than other maps, so that would make sense as well. 

Let's run through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to hit the most typical causes of FPS drops. Hit me back up if you're still having problems!

Hey bro thanks for responding but I tried just about all of these before and none worked :(( When i got my laptop repaired and got it back it was running league just fine but now i have the fps drops. thanks

When your laptop was repaired they may have been able to do some general file cleanup that made league run a little better. Since that guide wasn't able to help much, let's get you in touch with our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to look into this much deeper for you!
Ok ill do that but do you suggest anything i should do or do you have any idea what happened?? i have a feeling its the summoners rift map but idk

It could be that your pc is just having a hard time running all of the assets that Summoner's Rift needs. My best suggestion is to wait for those tech guys to get back to you in your ticket, since y'know that's their thing and all hah ^_^!
